data.title: Donora and Beaver Meadows, Pa.
data.meta_description: Joseph Allen Martinez, 75, of Donora and Beaver Meadows, Pa., died July 21, 2023. He was born in New Eagle on March 26, 1948, son of Joseph A. Martinez and Anna Mae Vankirk Martinez. He graduated from Donora High School, Class of 1967. He served in the U.S. Air Force and was a veteran of Vietnam and member of the DAV. He retired from Boeing Aircraft. He was preceded in...
